page.title: 04COMMENT ON AUCHTERTOOL(CONT)
page.content: Provoked now to fury the domini I cursed. And offered to cudgel the wretch if he durst. But the door he fast bolted tho' Boreas blew cool And left me all friendless in old Auchtertool. ****************** Auchtertool today can show more hospitality to visitors with it's new modern hotel at the western end of the village!Nevertheless,the villagers still tend to "keep themselves to themselves"and there is very little socialising with the surrounding farm- ing population. Within the last five years a new private housing estate has been built between the old village of Auchtertool and Newbiggin. This influx of newcomers has brought a few (cont)
